Method Detail

validate

public java.util.Map<org.tmapi.core.Construct,java.util.Set<ValidationResult>> validate(org.tmapi.core.Construct construct)
                                                                                 throws TMCLValidatorException,
                                                                                        org.tmapi.core.TMAPIException
Method to executed the validation of an specific topic maps construct. Note: For the moment, always the whole topic maps will be validated.

Parameters:
construct - - The topic map construct which will be validated.
Returns:
A set of invalid constructs and the corresponding constraint validator results. Returns an empty map if topic map is valid.
Throws:
org.tmapi.core.TMAPIException
TMCLValidatorException
